messages.subject: Re: About Immunizing
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Jodie... I m about 20 miles from Texas in Louisiana and there was no one (that I could find) unschooling anywhere in the world, much less in Louisiana. But
messages.messageBody:
Hi Jodie... I'm about 20 miles from Texas in Louisiana and there was
no one (that I could find) unschooling anywhere in the world, much
less in Louisiana. But that was 20+ years ago. I never had Laurie
immunized, but I had no idea it was illegal. I just never had it
done. So, I was more of a rebel than I thought. ;-)

love, Valerie

--- In Unschooling-dotcom@y..., Jodie <stanchnmotion@y...> wrote:
>
> Hi,
>
> I've been reading these posts (atleast the ones that I can find
about unschooling) for a couple of months now but this is the first
time that I have ever posted. I live in Texas and don't know anyone
out here in the country that "unschools". I have a 13yo and he has
always been homeschooled. Here are some good sites about legally
refusing vaccines.
>
> http://www.mercola.com/article/vaccines/legally_avoid_shots.htm
>
> http://www.909shot.com/
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
> ---------------------------------
> Do you Yahoo!?
> Yahoo! News - Today's headlines
>
> [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: About Immunizing
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, I ve been reading these posts (atleast the ones that I can find about unschooling) for a couple of months now but this is the first time that I have ever
messages.messageBody:
Hi,

I've been reading these posts (atleast the ones that I can find about unschooling) for a couple of months now but this is the first time that I have ever posted. I live in Texas and don't know anyone out here in the country that "unschools". I have a 13yo and he has always been homeschooled. Here are some good sites about legally refusing vaccines.

http://www.mercola.com/article/vaccines/legally_avoid_shots.htm

http://www.909shot.com/







---------------------------------
Do you Yahoo!?
Yahoo! News - Today's headlines

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
